messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] unschooling Spanish
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 2/10/2004 7:18:03 PM Eastern Standard Time, acornlittle@yahoo.com writes: Inspired by Dora the Explorer, my 4 1/2 year old son wants to
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 2/10/2004 7:18:03 PM Eastern Standard Time,
acornlittle@... writes:
Inspired by Dora the Explorer, my 4 1/2 year old son wants to learn Spanish.
I was wondering if anyone had any suggestions or recommendations for any toys
or games that he might find interesting that can help him with this. Thanks
in advance.<<<<<<


Spanish books for children. Finger games in Spanish (like Where is
Thumbkin?). Spanish songs. Just like English speaking babies! <g>

~Kelly

messages.subject: unschooling Spanish
messages.msgSnippet: Inspired by Dora the Explorer, my 4 1/2 year old son wants to learn Spanish.  I was wondering if anyone had any suggestions or recommendations for any toys or
messages.messageBody:
Inspired by Dora the Explorer, my 4 1/2 year old son wants to learn Spanish. I was wondering if anyone had any suggestions or recommendations for any toys or games that he might find interesting that can help him with this. Thanks in advance.

Chris in Michigan
